definition.name: NXcg_triangle_set

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

symbol.name: d
symbol.doc: The dimensionality, which has to be at least 2.

symbol.name: c
symbol.doc: The cardinality of the set, i.e. the number of triangles.

symbol.name: n_unique
symbol.doc: The number of unique vertices supporting the triangles.

definition.doc: Computational geometry description of a set of triangles.

group.name: triangles
group.doc: A simple approach to describe the entire set of triangles when the main intention is to store the shape of the triangles for visualization purposes.

field.name: edge_length
field.doc: Array of edge length values. For each triangle the edge length is reported for the edges traversed according to the sequence in which vertices are indexed in triangles.

field.name: interior_angle
field.doc: Array of interior angle values. For each triangle the angle is reported for the angle opposite to the edges which are traversed according to the sequence in which vertices are indexed in triangles.

group.name: bounding_box
group.doc: Axis-aligned or (approximate) (optimal) bounding boxes to each polygon.
